Html:
First, it is a great job you guys have done.

I am thinking it will be so nice if you guys can extend this project to a MVC 2 based CMS.

 

So admin can at least add a detalied album page or edit it.

 

Again, appreciate your work!

Thanks, @hanwesh, glad you like it.

This is a tutorial designed to keep things simple and explain the concepts of ASP.NET MVC, so a CMS is way out of scope. I'd suggest you check out one of the existing MVC based CMS projects on CodePlex, including the Orchard project: http://orchard.codeplex.com/
